item.title: Robocrab: data-driven adaptation of the evation behaviour in fiddler crabs
item.description: We create a semi-supervised structure of neural network, inspired by the physiology of neurons in fiddler crabs, and train it to adapt the evasion behaviour of fiddler crabs on potential predators, solving a complicated visuomotor problem (developed in Python using the Theano/Tensorflow-based ‘keras’ library

item.title: Deep learning algorithms for multi-label data
item.description: We extended a Java library implementing Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Deep Belief Networks and we used it to examine how they perform in a variety of multi-label data-sets.
